nodes.text: The Trigaskian Blur was a location in space that was situated within the galaxy's Wild Space, relatively far from the Inner Rim planet Mindor. When the Mindor resistance leader Aeona Cantor asked her fellow insurgent Tripp about the status of subspace jammers that the Imperial warlord Shadowspawn had installed on Mindor in the year 5 ABY, Tripp replied that the jammers were inoperative, adding that the resistance could send a subspace signal across the considerable distance between the planet and the Trigaskian Blur if they wanted to.

The Trigaskian Blur was first mentioned in the 2008 novel Luke Skywalker and the Shadows of Mindor, written by Matthew Stover, and was placed in grid square W-10 by the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas.
